 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקֵד‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==almond== (-tree) (Late Hebrew ***id.***; so called from its early ***waking*** out of winter's sleep, according to [[BDB#Ki|Ki]] [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 45</sup> and others; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שִׁיגְדָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, whence Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 39</sup>; compare [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No. 319</sup>); — 

**1.** ***almond***, i.e. the nut, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁקֵדִים‎</span> [[Gen.43.11|Gen 43:11]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּטְנִים‎</span>, etc.), [[Num.17.23|Num 17:23]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** ***almond-tree*** [[Jer.1.11|Jer 1:11]] and (probably) [[Eccl.12.5|Eccl 12:5]].
